aboutUsPage.contentWhoWeAre: Trust Systems focuses on addressing challenges and issues in the medical sector, primarily in Egypt, and plans to expand its reach to neighboring countries. The company recognizes a significant gap in the medical field in software support, both from management and scientific standpoints. Trust Company is committed to bridging this gap by integrating advanced technologies into the healthcare industry.
aboutUsPage.contentOurVision: To be the recognized leader in the field of laboratory medicine in the Middle East. This vision is achieved through: The commitment of our leaders and employees to our mission and core values. Providing the ideal environment during the work environment. Innovative application of new technology
aboutUsPage.contentOurMission: Patient-centered care guided by CuraSync The patient needs to achieve the objectives of the laboratory service. Continuous Learning A small group of thoughtful, committed people can change the world. Communications seek CuraSync Strive to gain and understand relevant information, CuraSync To achieve superior performance in all its activities, to maintain clinical, organizational and financial strength

medicalServicesPage.introductionWithMedicalServices: in the rapidly evolving landscape of healthcare, the integration of technology has paved the way for a new era of medical service delivery.'Smart Medical Service' represents a transformative approach to healthcare, leveraging cutting-edge technologies to enhance patient care, streamline diagnostics, and improve the overall efficiency of medical practices.
medicalServicesPage.MedicalServiceOfListTitle: The Emergence of Smart Medical Services
medicalServicesPage.MedicalServiceOfListDescription: Smart Medical Services, like telemedicine and AI diagnostics, improve patient care and help doctors diagnose and manage diseases more precisely.

contactUsPage.introduction: feel free to contact us and we appreciate suggestions

newPatientForm.NameValidation: should start with a capital letter followed by 2-18 characters
